pages.md:
# LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the electronic viewfinder. The indicators displayed can be selected using **SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING**.

!EVF Indicators

- **OFF**: Standard display.
- **ON**: Large indicators displayed.

> ⚠️ **Note:** Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF) (see page 13).

> 💡 **Tip:** If LARGE INDICATORS MODE is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle LARGE INDICATORS MODE on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (see page 321).

# LARGE INDICATORS MODE (LCD)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the LCD monitor. The indicators displayed can be selected using **SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING**.

!LCD Indicators

- **OFF**: Standard display.
- **ON**: Large indicators displayed.

> ⚠️ **Note:** Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for LARGE INDICATORS MODE (LCD) (see page 15).

> 💡 **Tip:** If LARGE INDICATORS MODE is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle LARGE INDICATORS MODE on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (see page 321).
